archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.2: Malware protection software should be installed on systems that are exposed to malware (e.g. those that are connected to networks or the internet, support the use of removable media or are accessed by external suppliers), including:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
